metadata.title: CVE-2023-1249 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free flaw was found in the Linux kernelâ€™s core dump subsystem.This flaw allows a local user to crash the system. Only if patch390031c94211 ("coredump: Use the vma snapshot in fill_files_note") notapplied yet, then kernel could be affected.
